ti:edition.ti:label: Pro Archia Poeta
ti:edition.ti:description: Cicero. M. Tulli Ciceronis. Orationes, Vol. 6. Clark, Albert Curtis, editor. Oxford: Clarendon Press, 1911.

ti:translation.ti:label: For Archias
ti:translation.ti:description: The orations of Marcus Tullius Cicero Vol 2. Three orations on the Agrarian law, the four against Catiline, the orations for Rabirius, Murena, Sulla, Archias, Flaccus, Scaurus, etc; Cicero, Marcus Tullius, creator; Yonge, Charles Duke, 1812-1891, translator
